GPPSceneController_Text_1:
Your Pokémon GO Plus + detected
that you tried to start tracking
your sleep.
You can’t start tracking sleep while
your Pokémon GO Plus + is
communicating with the app. Leave
this screen and wrap up any ongoing
communication, then try again.
GPPSceneController_Text_2:
Your Pokémon GO Plus + is in silent
mode. You'll need to toggle silent
mode off to test playback. To toggle
silent mode off, hold down the top
button and simultaneously press the
main button for at least one second.
GPPSceneController_Text_3:
Bluetooth couldn't be used. Please
enable Bluetooth in your mobile device
settings and try again.
GPPSceneController_Text_4:
Connection to the Pokémon GO Plus +
has been lost.
GPPConnectionModal_Text_1:
Connecting to the
Pokemon GO Plus +...
GPPConnectionModal_Text_2:
Sleep data found in the
Pokemon GO Plus +!
GPPConnectionModal_Text_4:
You still have sleep reports
you need to review.
GPPConnectionModal_Text_5:
There's sleep data tracked
during maintenance to review.
GPPConnectionModal_Text_6:
Your Pokémon Box is full.
Please make space in your Box
before doing any sleep research.
GPPSceneMorningView_Text_1: Your alarm will sound at the time you set here.
GPPSceneNightView_Text_1:
Set your bedtime to get a notification from your
Pokémon GO Plus + when that time rolls around.
GPPSleepDataErrorCell_Text_1:
This sleep session was too short to
be used. Sleep sessions must be at
least 90 minutes long to be used for
sleep research.
GPPSleepDataErrorCell_Text_2:
The tracked time period overlaps with
that of an existing sleep session.
GPPSleepDataErrorCell_Text_3:
You've already reached a sleep score of
100 based on other sleep data from the
same day!
GPPSleepDataErrorCell_Text_4:
You’ve already tracked two sleep
sessions to collect data for this date.
You can only collect two sets of data
per day.
GPPUnregisteredPopup_Text_1:
The Pokémon GO Plus + you had been
using was reset to its factory settings,
which unpaired it from this device.

To use it again, select "Pair a Device"
from the "Settings and More" section of
the Main Menu and pair it once again.
GPPUnregisteredPopup_Text_2:
The Pokémon GO Plus + you had been
using was paired to another device,
which unpaired it from this one.

To use it again, select "Pair a Device"
from the "Settings and More" section of
the Main Menu and pair it once again.
GPPScene_TopView_Desc: Change various settings for your device here.
GPPScene_TopView_Desc_5: Check records from your Pokémon GO Plus +.
GPPScene_TopView_Title_10:
Poké Stops Spun in
Pokémon GO
GPPScene_WakeSettingView_Desc:
When you’re tracking sleep, your alarm will ring at the time
you’ve set. If you enable the smart alarm feature, the
alarm will ring when you are in a light sleep state.
GPPScene_NightSettingView_Desc:
You'll receive a notification through your Pokemon Go Plus +
at the bedtime you've set for yourself.
GPPScene_NightSettingView_Desc_2: Sound will play when you start tracking sleep.
GPPAlarmSoundSelectPopup_Desc: The sound you set will be played.
GPPAnalyzeStoppedPopup_Desc:
Sleep tracking stopped for some reason
before you ended your sleep session.
We'll use whatever data was captured
before this occurred for your research.
GPPAnalyzeStoppedPopup_Desc_Nodata:
Sleep tracking stopped for some reason
before you ended your sleep session.
GPPAutoConnectOffPopup_Desc:
Going forward, you will need to press the
main button on your Pokémon GO Plus +
to connect to it.
You'll need to connect in order to sync
your sleep data on the Pokémon GO Plus +
device with the Pokémon Sleep app.
GPPAutoConnectOnPopup_Desc:
Your Pokémon GO Plus + will automatically
connect from now on, syncing any sleep
data saved within it with the Pokémon
Sleep app whenever it can connect.
GPPConnectionErrorPopup_Desc:
Pokémon GO Plus + not found.
Please check that it is nearby and
�毿Ｗnot in sleep tracking mode��＀.
GPPDataBrokenPopup_Desc:
Your sleep data has become corrupted.
This can occur if the reset button on your
Pokémon Go Plus + is pressed or the
device runs out of battery multiple times
before syncing successfully with the app.
�毿ＷThe affected data has been deleted.

��＀If you expect you won't be using the app
again for a while, do your best to sync all
your data beforehand!
GPPLowBatteryPopup_Desc:
Your Pokemon Go Plus +
is running low on battery!
GPPOptionPopup_Desc_AutoConnect_1:
This allows Pokémon GO Plus + to connect to
Pokémon Sleep automatically. Your sleep data will
be shared with Pokémon Sleep without you needing
to press the button on your Pokémon GO Plus +.
GPPOptionPopup_Desc_AutoConnect_2:
Please disable this setting when taking your device
on an airplane or into a hospital or any other setting
where you should disable wireless communications.
GPPOptionPopup_Desc_LowBattery:
Choose to have warnings displayed when the battery
is getting low in your Pokémon GO Plus +.
GPPOptionPopup_Desc_SilentMode:
Choose to have warnings displayed when your
Pokémon GO Plus + is in silent mode.
GPPPairingAndDescPopup_Desc:
The �쨗ｎPokémon GO Plus +��＀ device allows
you to track your sleep without
relying on your smart device.
GPPPairingAndDescPopup_DescView_1:
Connect it to �쨗ｎPokémon Sleep��＀, and
a special Pikachu will come help!
GPPPairingAndDescPopup_DescView_2:
Connect it to other apps, such as
�쨗ｎPokémon GO��＀, to use other features.
GPPPikachuStatusPopup_Desc:
This special Pikachu will regularly pitch in to
help you. It will get friendlier toward you the
more you use your Pokémon GO Plus + to
track your sleep.
GPPSendSettingErrorPopup_Desc:
Failed to send new settings to your
Pokémon GO Plus + device.
Would you like to try again?
GPPSilentModePopup_Desc:
Warning! Your Pokémon GO Plus +
is currently in silent mode, meaning you
will not hear any alarms, etc.
GPPSmartAlarmSettingPopup_HeadlineDesc:
With a smart alarm, your alarm may go off earlier
than the time you originally set it for, if the app
detects that you are in a light sleep stage.
GPPSnooseSettingPopup_HeadlineDesc:
When you snooze your alarm, it will continue to
go off at the intervals you've set, until you fully
turn it off.
GPPSyncSuccessPopup_Desc_2:
Sleep data was found on your
Pokémon GO Plus + device.
GPPTimeSettingPopup_HeadlineDesc: Your alarm will sound at the time you set here.
GPPUnreportedPopup_Desc:
The data on your Pokémon GO Plus +
can't be retrieved while you have
unreviewed sleep reports waiting.

Please return to the home screen
and review your pending reports first.
GPPVoiceListPopup_Desc:
Choose a Pikachu cry to hear it played
back from your GO Plus +.
GPPVoiceListPopup_HeadlineDesc:
New cries will be unlocked at random as Pikachu
grows more friendly toward you.
GPPVoiceListPopup_HeadlineDesc_2:
These are special cries you can hear if you meet
certain conditions. Once you've heard them from
your GO Plus +, you can play them again here.
GPPVolumeSettingPopup_HeadlineDesc: The sound will play at the volume you set.
GPPVolumeSettingPopup_HeadlineDesc_2:
Sounds will play from your Pokemon GO Plus +
at the volume you've set above.
GPPSleepDataErrorCell_Error_DataVersionN:
We couldn't use the sleep you
tracked because the data is from
an outdated software version.
GPPScene_HelpPopup_Text:
This will take you to our official
website with more details on using
your Pokémon GO Plus +.

Are you sure you want to open
this site?
